title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The list box of the report parameter does not retain the default value after modifying it.
EB: The default value should remain unchanged in the list box of the report parameter after modifying it.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings. 
2. Set a default value for the list box. 
3. Modify the default value. 
4. Verify if the modified default value is retained in the list box. 
5. Check if the 'OK' button is grayed out after modifying the default value.
